exact_source: Great Divide Mining Ltd (ASX:GDM)(“GDM” or the “Company”) is pleased to announce that it has completed acquisition of two tenements through Asset Sale Agreements with VGE Pty Ltd (VGE) and Alluvial Gold Mining Pty Ltd (AGM) pursuant to which it has purchased 100% of Exploration Permit for Minerals (EPM) 26062 and 26135 respectively. (GDM is purchasing these tenements for shares).
